title: Silver 5 ADC looking for casual ranked team.
body:
Hi I'm silver 5 my ranked w:l ratio is not good but I reckon it's because my mmr has gone to shit after a few losing streaks and playing on and off (due to losing streaks), so i only ever seem to get matched with trolls or people who have no idea what to do.

Anyway I my best role is ADC, Lucian is my definite favourite and I think I'm pretty decent with him. I do consistently well in lane with Lucian. I'm also alright at vayne, but seem to be more of a crit or miss. 

I'm looking for a casual team of like minded players that's just tired of the idiots in solo queue and who will play to win. Not looking for scheduled practice hours or anything like that. I just want to get away from the idiots in solo queues who have never heard of a thing called warding or sweepers vs stealth champs, y know what I'm talking about.

NZ based would be good. 
Can get tea speak or curse or w.e voice com programme you guys use.
Current silver 5 peaked at silver 1. 
Would prefer team in silver range.

Message "Ellionce" in game if interested. 

Thanks for reading.

replies.body:
same here dude

i main jungle/mid

im good at support hate playing with %%%% adc's
